DOC.brief_title: Comparative Mixture Non-racemic Racemic Enantiomers Bupivacaine Cesarean
DOC.detailed_description: The enantiomeric mixture bupivacaine S75 : R25 ( 75 % levobupivacaine 25 % bupivacaine ) develop safety regional anesthetic substitution racemic bupivacaine ( S50 : R50 ) .
